properties.entry: SELECT N.*, U.USER_NAME, T.TEAM_NAME, (SELECT NI.IMG_RENAME FROM NEWS_IMG NI WHERE N.NEWS_NO = NI.NEWS_NO AND NI.IMG_LEVEL = 1) AS NEWS_IMG FROM NEWS N JOIN USER_INFO U ON N.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN TEAMS T ON N.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE NEWS_ST = 'N'
SELECT N.*, U.USER_NAME, T.TEAM_NAME FROM NEWS N JOIN USER_INFO U ON N.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN TEAMS T ON N.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE N.NEWS_NO = ? AND NEWS_ST = 'N'
UPDATE NEWS SET NEWS_TITLE = ?, TEAM_NO = ?, NEWS_PUBLISHER = ?, NEWS_CONTENT = ?, UPDATE_DT = DEFAULT WHERE NEWS_NO = ?
